Text: Enron Property Services Corp New SF Service Center Developement at Beltway and Clay Roadwe will do an excellent job for you on this deal if you give us the nod We are anxious to expand our relationship with you by becoming a continually more valuable resource for you We would appreciate your support I will look forward to visiting with you soon Thanks Forwarded by Robert DuncanHOUSTONTranswestern on AM Brian Gammill PM To Robert ranswestern cc Rob ranswestern Subject Enron Property Services Corp New SF Service Center Developement at Beltway and Clay Road Robert we have been asked by Henry Terech Jr and Lance McCarthy of Enron Property Services Corp to submit a proposal to construct on behalf of Enron a square foot service center along the Beltway just south of Clay Road Enron would purchase the land and finance the project and we would take the lead role as Developement Manager and assist Enron in the design construction and developement of the project This is a piece of business that we want and we are uniquely qualified to execute As you know we have developed over square feet of new industrial and service center space in this immediate area the last three years and can provide alot of value to Enron based on our experience We have submitted a preliminary budget and will follow up with Henry and Lance next week with a formal proposal Please let me know your thoughts Thanks
